name: Virus Inc
description:
Scientists in a secret underground lab have developed a super virus. They have set up a simulation to test how good the virus really is, and you control that simulation! Prove that this super virus is capable of destroying the world!

Theme: Simulation
Limitation: Movement is Lethal

Created: 7-9th of January for the Mini Jam 97

Music: Creepy by bensound.com
Sound: Mixkit mixkit.co
